title: First Black Sabbath album (Black Sabbath) font
content:
Hi, I was wondering what font this is.. or if it’s just a hand-drawn logo..  
 [http://www.videoblacksabbath.info/black-sabbath3-big.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20091207085634/http:/www.videoblacksabbath.info/black-sabbath3-big.jpg "http://www.videoblacksabbath.info/black-sabbath3-big.jpg")

Thanks / SmashanKali
author: SmashanKali

comments.content:
It’s Manuscript Capitals, an old Letraset face.

- Lex
